body: Let's be honest here, if she told her husband that his brother and father made a move on her, what's the worst that could happen? Worst case scenario; he'll be mad and divorce her but after disowning his family.
My god that ending Phew ムラムラです

Well the brother did rape her but thats not gonna change the fact that then she kept returning to him even after the husband caught her and when be caught her that wasnt the face of a woman being raped.

Damn, scrolling more than 600 pages and still not ended yet. But I must say, the wife actually a victim here, why the husband punish her? If the husband really a true man, he must punch his brother istead rather than punishing his wife
I only skimmed the last half by the way to try and get some closure.

Well even i can see the husband confronted her and tried to teach her a little lesson. But here's the kicker, she seemed to enjoy it and i couldn't tell because i can't read jap, but was there any indication she would stop sleeping with other guy's ? Well not that they gave her much choice because they were basically rapists.
is that the end? whaat? is there chapter 20 coming?

Seems like in the end she's fucked by one after another guys while the guys fucking another girls too then the girls that fucked doing it with another guys and the chain continue until all civilization in a country or whole world cuckolded they lover each other.. if she (the heroine) resist herself, fight back the guy and keep loyal to her husband this event turn out never happen..

I guess that IS the ending... anticlimactic. Story was kinda generic (another one of those wife stories falling to carnal pleasures one way or another) but art is pretty good, especially the body proportions are quite consistent and somewhat realistic.
After a whole year, we see no more further chapters as of today Jan/11/2021... so is this how it ends?
